site.name: vClock
site.description: Free online tools for time management

alarm.title: Online Alarm Clock
alarm.description: Free online alarm clock. Set alarm for any time with customizable sounds. No registration required.
alarm.presetsHint: Click to quickly set an alarm for these common times

timer.title: Online Timer
timer.description: Free online countdown timer. Set timer for any duration. Perfect for cooking, workouts, and productivity.

stopwatch.title: Online Stopwatch
stopwatch.description: Free online stopwatch with lap timer. Precise to milliseconds. Perfect for sports, workouts, and timing.

clock.title: World Clock
clock.description: Check current time in any city worldwide. Multiple time zones, accurate world clock.
clock.whatTimeIn: What time is it in {city} right now?

holidays.title: Holidays Calendar
holidays.description: Complete holidays calendar with countdown timers. Track days until Christmas, New Year, and all major holidays.

embed.title: Embed Code
embed.description: Copy this code to embed the tool on your website
